oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Natural, economic conditions, scientific and technical potential for the development of organic agriculture in Kyrgyzstan
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tinatin, Doolotkeldieva
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Crop health, quality, protection
Landscape and recreation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper provides a brief overview of the existing natural and economic preconditions, the scientific potential for the development of organic farming in ecologically clean areas and regions of the Kyrgyz Republic.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Tinatin, Doolotkeldieva (2014) Natural, economic conditions, scientific and technical potential for the development of organic agriculture in Kyrgyzstan. Speech at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
